---
title: "life-expectancy"
format: gfm

```{r}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
life_exp <- read.csv("data/DP_LIVE_11122023092440528.csv")
```

```{r}
exp2020 <- life_exp |> 
  filter(TIME == 2020 & SUBJECT == "TOT") |> 
  group_by(LOCATION) |> 
  summarise(
    years = Value
  )
```
